meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of arthropods
meanings.sent1: The arthropodan exoskeleton provides protection for insects.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the arthropodan features of the spider.
meanings.sent3: The arthropodan dance moves of the crab entertained the children.
meanings.sent4: Her arthropodan speed in the race amazed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The arthropodan colors of the butterfly were mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: an arthropod or member of the arthropod class
meanings.sent1: The arthropodan scuttled across the forest floor.
meanings.sent2: I found an arthropodan crawling on the leaf.
meanings.sent3: The arthropodan's tiny footsteps echoed in the cave.
meanings.sent4: The arthropodan's presence signaled the start of spring.
meanings.sent5: The arthropodan's shell shimmered in the sunlight.
